text: Lyudmila Chegodayeva (born 20 April 1992) is a Kazakhstani female water polo player. She was part of the Kazakhstan women's national water polo team at the 2009 FINA Junior Women's World Championships, 2011 World Aquatics Championships, and 2012 Women's Olympic Qualification Tournament. == References == == Other websites == * Lyudmila+Chegodayeva , zimbio Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani water polo players
title: Lyudmila Chegodayeva
